name: Pumpkin Spice Café
description:
Become a barista and talk with Café’s customers. Who knows? Maybe you'll change someone's life?

The game is currently a demo. We plan to add more content in future updates.

Game made by Adam Lepieszkiewicz, Kinga Brotoń and Kamil Rudziński for NaNoRenO 2020+.

Please try our other games at https://pryzmat.itch.io/
